## Front Matter

## Problem 1
```{r}
COD2 = COD %>% filter(FullPartial == "Full")
ggplot(data = COD2, mapping = aes(x = XPType, y = TotalXP))+geom_boxplot()+labs(x = "XP Type", y = "Total XP")
```
